email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for the shipment of 150,000 MT of iron ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao under CFR terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan of October 10-15?

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 180,000, LOA 300m, for your shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per metric tonne. The vessel is currently in Singapore and can be positioned to Port Hedland for your laycan.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Laura,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 18.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider revising the rate to USD 17.50 per metric tonne? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the expected loading window in Port Hedland?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 17.75 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window in Port Hedland is expected to be 3 days, starting from October 10.

Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Hello Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the rate of USD 17.75 per metric tonne. Please confirm the laycan of October 10-15 and send over the recap.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Iron Ore - Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
James,

Great! The laycan of October 10-15 is confirmed. Recap attached.

Commodity: Iron Ore
Quantity: 150,000 MT
Load Port: Port Hedland
Discharge Port: Qingdao
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV OCEAN HORIZON
Freight: USD 17.75/MT
Laycan: 10-15 Oct 2023
Demurrage: USD 20,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
